lastfm.__COMMENT: Your password is erased on first run with scrobbling enabled and will be used to calculate the authToken. Then on first login, session_key will be populated.
lastfm.__COMMENT2: If you dont already have an API key and API secret, see https://www.last.fm/api/authentication

analytics.__COMMENT: Sends the following information to an analytics server while the script is running: your identifier, what songs you've started, how long you've played each song, what difficulty and instrument you're playing
